Product name: Vintage TRIFARI KUNIO MATSUMOTO Necklace Earrings Demi Parure Cabochon Rhinestone Grape Cluster Gorgeous Rare Neiman Marcus
Description:
You are viewing a heavily sought after & signed Trifari grape cluster necklace and earring demi parure designed by Kunio Matsumoto. This drop dead demi parure is circa 1970'S. It was originally purchased at Neiman Marcus and has since been stored in the original leatherette pouch as shown. 
I am extremely detailed and want to provide you with as much information as possible. This gorgeous chic, gold plated glass cabochon demi parure is in great vintage condition and has a million miles left. All clasps are in proper working order. There are no bends to the metal findings. There are no missing cabochons or any with cracks or chips. There is a very minimal and unnoticeable wear to the gold plate on some of the connecting areas of the leaves however, again this is not noticeable. This is a fabulous statement set in absolutely fantastic condition! Haute Couture will never go out of fashion! 
***The dress form is a life sized ladies size small to help you in gauging size.***
Approximate Dimensions:
Length of Necklace Chain (hard to measure due to its design): 15"
Length of Extender Chain: 3.5"
Width of Necklace: .50"
Largest Grape Cluster (Necklace): 1.5" x 1.25"
Length of Earrings: 1 1/8"
Width of Earrings: 7/8"
Own a spectacular piece of vintage fine costume jewelry today...after all you deserve the very best! Plus it will make your friend and foes a bit "J" hehehe!
Since Etsy only allows 5 pictures to be uploaded per listing, I understand that there might be a need to obtain additional pictures. If so, or should you happen to have any questions, please contact me and I will get you taken care of. I want to make sure no questions go unanswered. Don't forget to utilize the zoom feature found on the bottom right hand side of each photo. 
Thank you for taking the time to view this listing. I have other vintage jewelry by Elizabeth Taylor, Tiffany & Co, Chanel, Lanvin, De Lillo, YSL, Miriam Haskell, Eugene, Juliana, Whiting and Davis, Weiss, Kenneth Jay Lane, Hattie Carnegie, Schiaparelli, Ciner, Stanley Hagler, Monet, Trifari, Napier, Nina Ricci & Beau Jewels that you might possibly be interested in as well.
https://www.etsy.com/shop/GalleryThreeSixty?section_id=14525701&ref=shopsection_leftnav_1
Be good to yourself and I wish you a fabulous day!

Product name: Vintage Bicycle Seat Cover from Afghanistan with Zazi Hand Embroidery, Glass Bead Fringe, and Velvet Backing
Description:
This vintage bicycle seat cover is from Afghanistan and has lovely  all over fine hand embroidery work plus charming bead work and a velvet backing.  The olive green backing was added on by the Old Silk Route, just in case someone wants to make it into a pillow...
SIZE: 14"inches x 16"inches-which includes the 1.5"inch border
COLORS:  burgundy on coral or burnt orange and white silver trim with multi colored beads-very attractive color combination which my description does not quite manage to convey
CONDITION: mint with no known issues of any kind
A one of a kind Afghani textile which Janet Harvey's book, Traditional Textiles of Central Asia, gives a great deal of information on pieces such as this.  Its Library of Congress ISBN# 0-500-01670-4 would be helpful if you might consider buying this book on line.  I highly recommend it.

Product name: Authentic Vintage French Leather Briefcase Messenger bag document bag signed Gerard Paris from 1980's in very clean condition
Description:
Authentic Vintage French Leather Briefcase Messenger bag document bag signed Gerard Paris from 1980's in very clean condition.
I found this authentic leather brief case document bag at a French Brocante (antiques market) The leather has the most beautiful patina, with leather interior in great condition for its age. Internal zipped pouch compartment, very clean, with only a few marks considering its age, photographed on here, these add to the vintage look. Good working external catch ready for business. Sturdy handle and is suitable as a working bag, a really truly lovely thing. I think this bag must be from around 1970-1980.
Measures: L 38cm x W 38cm x D x 10cm (with the handle) approximately.
Please see my other items on Etsy by visiting my shop by clicking the link below:
http://www.etsy.com/shop/MaisonbrocanteFrance
I pack every item with great care and I send it within 1-2 working days. If you are sending it as a present I am happy to enclose I card which I can write for you.
If you are ordering from UK, Germany, Austria, Belgium, Spain, Italy, Portugal, Switzerland, I can send by Mondial Relay, which makes the shipping charge cheaper, and is still delivered direct to your home address. If you are ordering from France I also use Mondial Relay, and this becomes very cheap, if you don’t mind collecting from a Point Relais. If you would rather have the item delivered to your home, let me know and I can send via Collissimo which is a higher cost. If you want to purchase several items together, I can recalculate you a better shipping price, where practical, just contact me in advance.
Do not hesitate to ask me for more information, I will be very pleased to help you, and I like to please my customers.
Your feedback is always welcome!
Thank you so much for your visit!
All our items are vintage so have obvious wear and tear for age, any marks are part of the overall charm, please see photos and ask for more details or photos, so you are happy before you purchase.

Description:
Eucalyptus Mint Bath Bomb by Sink and Soak - 4 ounces
This fresh, hand painted bath bomb soothes the skin while an aromatherapy blend of essential oils and natural ingredients uplifts body, mind & mood. Breathe deeply for best results.
These all natural bath bombs contain sodium bicarbonate, citric acid, epsom salts, cocoa butter, grape seed oil, french green clay, witch hazel, mica, eucalyptus and mint essential oils. 
This is a color-free bath bomb so the water will be creamy but not colored.
This bath bomb contains moisturizing oils that can make your bath tub slippery so be careful when getting in and out of your pampering bath.

Product name: Large Rice Pack - Heat Pad, Microwave Heating Pad, Heat Pack, Rice Bag, Heat Therapy Rice Bag, Pain Relief, Lilly Pulitzer, Flaxseed
Description:
This listing is for 1 Large Rice Pack with your choice fabric and scent.
Generously filled with a blend of rice and flaxseed that you can microwave for about 1 minute (may need to be adjusted according to your microwave) or you can store in your freezer. Make sure to shake before using, and if it's too hot let it sit until it cools down.
Good for headaches, menstrual cramps, arthritis, sore muscles, joint relief, shoulder pain, back pain, or just for a warm bed. Or storing in the fridge for boo-boos, sudden fevers, teething, or for cooling down on a warm day!
For the details, large rice packs measures approximately 10" x 5".  Pattern placement on fabric may vary slightly from the photo. Each pack is sealed with double-stitching to ensure durability.
**WARNING** Do not over heat, rice can burn and will need to be discarded.
Essential Oil Scent Blends:
Peppermint
Eucalyptus
Lavender
Chamomile
Migraine Master (Peppermint  Eucalyptus)
Muscle Master (Peppermint  Eucalyptus  Lavender)
Good Night (Lavender  Chamomile)
Stress Relief (Bergamot  Patchouli  Blood Orange  Ylang Ylang  Grapefruit)
Care Instructions: Spot clean with a damp cloth. Do not submerge in water. If rice gets wet, it could possibly mold and will need to be discarded.

Product name: June PRE-ORDER Spot 2 - Embroidered Bridal Bouquet Portrait Custom Hoop Art. Hand Embroidery Floral Keepsake. Wedding Cotton Anniversary.
Description:
June Pre-Order Spot #2
A timeless keepsake to remind you of one of the most wonderful days of your life. This Bridal Bouquet Portrait Hoop is everlasting and will never wither. A thoughtful, unique, and touching gift for any bride that captures the vivid colours and spirit of a bride's unique bouquet. 
These portraits aim to capture the "essence" and the feeling of your bridal bouquet in a timeless replica portrait, so that it will always be remembered, long after you've tossed the bouquet!
Your bouquet will be made to order and meticulously hand embroidered on natural off-white or light grey (as shown in photo #4) cotton canvas using cotton embroidery floss in a 4" or 6" wooden hoop Each hoop contains approximately 6-12 hours of detailed work and thousands of delicate stitches, Your hoop will be backed in co-ordinating cotton canvas and finished with my signature stamp. Every flower will not be embroidered, but the main elements and colours of your bouquet will be captured in loving detail.
You may choose to add your wedding date or initials to the bouquet by selecting this option from the drop down menu.
Upon purchase I will require a clear photo (or a few) of your bouquet. You may also wish to describe any important elements that cannot be seen in the photo in detail (e.g., the handle was wrapped in ribbon, there was a brooch/charm/buttons on the handle, etc.) These can be easily sent via Etsy convo. I'll keep in contact with you during the stitching process to ensure your hoop is as perfect as can be!
Your hoop will be packed with love and care, ready for gift giving, and shipped via Canada Post. Shipping within North America includes tracking, additional items ship free.
Photos in this listing are examples of custom bridal portraits that I've created from photos for past customers and friends. This listing is for a single (one) 6" embroidered bouquet portrait. Photo number 5 shows a comparison between my 4" and 6" embroidered bouquet hoops.
**Custom bouquet portrait hoops are currently on pre-order. Your hoop will be stitched and shipped within the month of June.**

Product name: Circuit Board Cufflinks & Tuxedo Studs, Circuit Board Jewelry, Shirt Stud, Wearable Technology, Tech Gift, Gift for Him, Wedding Gift
Description:
Look smashing at that fancy thing you have to get dressed up for!
These circuit board cufflinks are fashioned out of an old, broken circuit board. Bits of circuitry were hand cut to fit into small silver plated settings. The circuits are covered in a glass-like layer of resin, which provides a durable yet beautiful finish. The circuit part of each cuff link is 5/8 inches (16cm) across. The tuxedo studs feature round circuit board medallions that are 10 mm (3/8 inches) across and are mounted on nickel studs. 
These will come nicely wrapped as shown in the third listing photo! They work perfect as groomsmen gifts, graduation gifts, father's day gifts, and even the untechnically inclined can appreciate these!
Simpy choose the circuit board color you want as well as the number of shirt studs. Please allow up to seven business days for the creation of your custom circuit board tuxedo set. 
Last photo is for demonstration of size only. ________________________________________________________________________________________________________
All items are shipped in a black cotton-filled gift box for protection and wrapped in bubble wrap. All shipping materials used are recyclable. Description:
The rose gold shirt studs are a beautiful collection and can be made into a matching set of any of the cufflinks or tie bars that you see on 3DTHIS. •	Every item can be personalized and made into a custom order dependent upon your requirements

Cm : 1 x / 1 y / 1 z
In: 0.394 x / 0.394 y / 0.394 z
The base of the stud is 1.0 cm (0.4 in) in diameter, this is a typically standard size
Materials
•	Every item is available in a variety of different solid & plated metals
•	All plated metals are made as solid brass. A layer of palladium is added for durability with a final finish of your chosen metal
•	The silver used is typical sterling silver made of 92.5% pure silver and 7.5% copper

Production & Shipping

•	Manufacturing and shipping takes between 2 - 4 weeks

Additional Information
For any custom designs that you have or personalized changes to my existing designs, please request a custom order through the relevant options on this or the home page. If you have any further questions, please feel free to contact me and I will get back to you as soon as possible.

Product name: VICTORIAN PARASOL Umbrella in Black/Gold Stripe with Black Fringe or Lace Ruffle Bridal Steampunk Second Line Wedding Civil War Edwardian
Description:
Offered for sale is this handmade Victorian style parasol in an exquisite black and gold stripe fabric. The black stripe looks like satin and the gold stripe looks like grosgrain ribbon. It is expensive fabric and it looks it. The parasol is finished with your choice of black fringe or a black lace ruffle at the hem and tip.  It has a painted turned wood handle, rib tips and ferrule tip. You may choose to have the new knob handle tip or the plain handle. It is the perfect small size for a Victorian era parasol as it is about 23" in diameter when open and about 30" long.  It is finished with a tassel and parasol charm.    
 
This is a MADE TO ORDER item. I am usually two to four weeks out on shipping orders. If you have a rush order, contact me and I will tell you whether I will be able to meet your deadline. I do offer International shipping. 
In addition to my small Victorian size parasols at about 23" in diameter when open, I offer custom orders for larger size parasols, a 29” diameter, a 32” diameter and a 20” child size parasol. Victorian parasols are traditionally small in diameter but after many requests for larger parasols I will now make up any of my parasol styles in the new sizes by request. Convo me for a custom order. 
This parasol frame is very sturdy as it has a metal shaft.  Many parasols offered are made on inexpensive wood shafts that are easily broken and have an unreliable opening mechanism.  This metal handle also locks both open and closed for easy use and carrying.  
   Keep in mind that this is a parasol and not a rain umbrella.  It may be used as a sun shade and to add a lovely accent to your ensemble, but don't get it wet.  If it gets wet it will probably be damaged, and I cannot attest to the colorfastness of  any of the products used in it's creation.  
    
   This parasol will be a stunning accessory for a Victorian or Old West costume or beautiful as part of your costume.  If you are a parasol collector, this will be a lovely addition to your collection.

Description:
It is a water based polymer clay varnish. 
Use to protect decorations and preserve the sparkle and intensity of colors.
Apply with a finger or a brush. 
NOTE: shake the bottle very well before using.
Perfectly transparent after drying with maximum durability after 48 hrs. When the article is cold after baking, apply 2-3 coats of varnish allowing an hour between each coat. If you wish, finally when dry, bake again in a pre-heated household over for 15 minutes at 110 C.

Product name: Sculpey premo polymer clay set of 8
Description:
Hobby Hoppers
Premo Sculpey is an artist’s dream come true! After conditioning this clay is soft enough 
to blend easily but firm enough to hold fine detail  for specialized techniques. 
Because Premo retains flexibility, the finished product remains very strong and durable.  This unique characteristic makes Premo the most durable clay, ideal for jewelry, and more delicate projects like scrapbooking embellishments.
Premo comes in 24 densely saturated colors based on an artist’s palette.  
The colors are intense on their own but can also be blended for custom creations.
This combination of strength and beauty is easily transferred to any project you have in mind. 
This listing is for 8 x 57gram (2oz) bricks of clay. One of each colour shown.
White, Wasabi, Blush, Sunshine, Burnt Umber, Translucent White, Pomegranate and Colbalt.
Baking Instructions:  Bake at 275 °F (130 °C) for 30 minutes per 1/4 inch thickness.  
DO NOT MICROWAVE.   Baking should be completed by an adult. 
DO NOT EXCEED THE ABOVE TEMPERATURE OR RECOMMENDED BAKING TIME.

Product name: Decoden Cream - Glitter Deco Cream JellyWhip™ - 60ml (Free 2 tips!)
Description:
Sophie & Toffee latest series of Glitter JellyWhip™ comes in 12 delightful colours with fruity fragrance and doesn't smells like silicone!
These whips are made of water-based, entirely silicone-free and non-toxic. They will look like jelly and dry transparent.
These are our latest improved version with lesser shrinkage and in more consistent beautiful colors. This version comes in a new packaging tube which you can directly attached these piping tips for easy application!
Each tube will come with 2 free tips randomly selected. Or you can purchase compatible piping tips here.
These deco cream are best used on hard cases or surfaces, and you can used to decorate mobile cases, photo frames, containers and more.
Besides using them as decorative cream, they can also be use as part of a charm, to create the realistic whip cream effect.
Though they do not hold as much details nor dried as rubbery as silicone, they are as close as silicone yet non-toxic!
Usage instructions:
✿ Attached your desired piping tip to the opening of the tube
✿ Alternatively, you can squeeze out the contents into a piping bag
✿ Allow for 48 hours in order for the whip to be thoroughly dry
✿ Wash out the tip for future usage
Volume: 60ml
★ Please do not purchase this item if your climate is at below -0 degrees, this item will freeze.

Product name: Make Your Own Bauble - Hot Glass Flame Working Taster Session - Glass Workshop - Bauble Course
Description:
This listing is for 2 people to each design and blow their own bauble at the FoxGlass studio
More skill focused based sessions for people who have more experience of flameworking or want to spend longer experimenting with the medium of hot glass flameworking are available and information is listed below.
We also offer a course for two people to each make a spinning top at £40
Two people to each make a bauble and a spinning top for £70
or two people to each make a bauble or top and a marble or pendant at £90
Foxglass Flameworking Courses & Taster Sessions -  Treat yourself to a unique experience or bring a couple of friends. The FoxGlass studio will accommodate up to 8 people and sharing the experience will give you something to remember and talk about for a long time to come.
Upon booking your taster session we will contact you to arrange a sutible day and time. Our studio is open 9am to 4pm weekdays except Wednesdays almost all year round as well as around 2 weekends a month. 
Work with a flame at several thousand degrees Celsius and in a few hours produce a memento of your day that you’ll treasure forever. This listing offers you a chance to experience a mini taster session and make your very own bauble, or spinning top. You’ll be fully assisted right along the way, so you can be sure you’ll want to take your creation home and show it to your friends.
Your course will take place in an enviroment with a proud tradition of flame and artisanship. FoxGlass are based in a former blacksmiths workshop. You'll be visiting us in an unspoilt rural location, the tiny Welsh border hamlet of Llangunllo.
We can also provide gift cards with your taster session booking if you wish to give one as a gift. 
Our Expertise at Your Fingertips
When you work with Chris Fox-James you’ll be taking advantages of his years of experience as a flameworker. You’ll find his passion and enthusiasm will fire your own ideas, whatever you want to get out of the day FoxGlass will work with you to make sure you get it. 
Every taster course can be tailored to your specific requirements and all materials and safety equipment are included in the price you pay. You’ll be fully briefed on safely at the start of the session and you’ll get a certificate to take home with you at the end of the day, just to go alongside your own unique hand-crated glass work. 
We also have a mobile studio that we can bring to you for parties and events if your looking for an unusal activity. Any questions please drop us a line here on Etsy, or send us an email
 mail [!at] foxglass.co.uk

CARE
  It is advisable to remove jewellery when bathe in the sea, swimming pool, bath and shower.
  Avoid using your piece on the beach because the contact with salted water and sand, certainly will scratch them. Besides the fact that salted water has a high oxidising power, which leads to darkening.
  Put on perfume or hair spray a few minutes before wearing you jewellery, to evaporate the excess.
  Avoid contact with cleaning products, products for personal hygiene, cosmetics and chemicals in general, they can damage the piece.
  Never clean or polish any item with supplies like metal brushes, steel wool or abrasive cloths, as they will scratch the surface of the piece.

Product name: Custom Painted Hi Top Beauty and the Beast Disney Shoes
Description:
Take away these beautiful shoes and really feel like the belle of the ball! 
For shoe size conversions please use this guide: http://www.clarks.co.uk/help/fitguide
All shoes are hand painted with detail and precision, so please be patient when ordering. Times can jump from around 2 weeks to 6 weeks, however we will endeavour to keep that time as short as possible with updates on your order.
The paint used is Acrylic paint, which when dry becomes naturally elastic and water resistant, giving it bold, bright colour for months, as well as flexibility and durability when walking. We also spray our shoes with water resistant spray, to give them an extra helping hand to keep your shoes looking at their best. Cleaning requires a soft sponge, rubbed gently over the image. The paint will not run, so they are more then suitable in the rain!
All shoes are customisable, so if you'd like a different colour background, or a name added, please feel free to say when ordering. All name personalisations are free!
